mcq.statement: Which countries and islands border the Bay of Bengal?

options.a: India, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Sri Lanka, Sumatra
options.b: India, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Maldives, Sri Lanka, Sumatra
options.c: India, Bangladesh, Thailand, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Sri Lanka, Sumatra
options.d: India, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Sri Lanka, Borneo

mcq.one_liner: The Bay of Bengal is bordered by **India, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Andaman and Nicobar Islands (India), Sri Lanka, and Sumatra (Indonesia)**.
